DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial demonstrate bioequivalence Wosulin 70/30 Novolin® 70/30 regard total maximum serum insulin concentration .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Wockhardt 's Glucose Clamp Study-Human Isophane Susp 30IU/ml/70IU/ml With Novolin70/30 , Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test bioequivalence base AUC0-24h Cmax Wosulin 70N/30R Novolin 70/30.The study also compare pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic profile well assess safety local tolerability two insulin preparation healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female subject . 2 . Age ≥ 18 ≤ 45 year . 3 . Considered generally healthy upon completion medical history , physical examination biochemical investigation judge Investigator . 4 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.0 27.0 kg/m2 , inclusive . 5 . ( Trialrelated activity procedure would perform normal management subject. ) . 1 . Previous participation trial clinical trial within last 30 day . 2 . Clinically significant abnormal haematology biochemistry screen test , judge Investigator . Use prescription drug within 3 week precede first dose insulin , except oral contraceptives/hormonal implant . 10 . Treatment insulin product past . 11 .
